strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy weekend! Here are some ideas on how to spend it:

  • 900-mile journey: Go experience an artist's journey along the Trail of Tears at the Momentary this weekend.
  • Create: Make blankets and new friends as part of Project Linus at Grace United Methodist Church tomorrow.
  • Swing: Support Razorback Baseball today at their first game of the season, a home game against Illinois State.
  • Rights: Listen and learn from a Freedom Rider at Crystal Bridges on Sunday.
  • Ice sport: Give curling a try at the Jones Center, 3-4:45p every Sunday.
  • Hit it: Razorback Softball will be happening at Bogle park for the Razorback Invitational this afternoon.
  • Hum along: Lots of music is filling the NWA streets this weekend. Take a look and maybe catch a gig!
  • Hearts and shells: Take your kids out for a painting class Saturday and spread some love.

Have a lovely weekend and see you Monday!
